testcase.name: Auth POST /auth should throw 401 if credentials are incorrect
testcase.classname: should throw 401 if credentials are incorrect

testcase.name: Users POST /users should reject signup when data is incomplete
testcase.classname: should reject signup when data is incomplete

testcase.name: Users GET /users should not fetch all users
Users GET /users/:id should not fetch user if token is invalid
testcase.classname: should not fetch user if token is invalid

testcase.name: Users GET /users/:id should throw 404 if user doesn't exist
testcase.classname: should throw 404 if user doesn't exist

testcase.name: Users PUT /users/:id should not update user if token is invalid
testcase.classname: should not update user if token is invalid

testcase.name: Users PUT /users/:id should throw 404 if user doesn't exist
testcase.classname: should throw 404 if user doesn't exist

testcase.name: Users DELETE /users/:id should not delete user if token is invalid
testcase.classname: should not delete user if token is invalid

testcase.name: Users DELETE /users/:id should throw 404 if user doesn't exist
testcase.classname: should throw 404 if user doesn't exist
